summary: A throne room added to the house mod Deus Mons
descriptionHtml:
A small add-on which adds a Throne, candles, and a rug to the back of Deus Mons. It is on the main floor, Hall of Heroes and Gods, toward the back.

Pictures show where it is and what it looks like.

Actual house mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11803

Credit goes to Eldiabs, Daemonjax, koaandl, and Utopolys for the original house mod

Installation is really simple. Just put the ESP into the data folder and select it on start up.
author: Fallens
